quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Science is a way of thinking much more than it is a body of knowledge.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.
author: Harold Abelson

quote: The science of today is the technology of tomorrow.
author: Edward Teller

quote: The good thing about science is that it's true whether or not you believe in it.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad.
author: Cory House

quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The human brain has 100 billion neurons, but the network of connections is what matters.
author: Jeff Hawkins

quote: Everybody in this country should learn to program a computer because it teaches you how to think.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
author: John Johnson

quote: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
author: Martin Fowler

quote: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: In science, there are no shortcuts to truth.
author: Louis Pasteur

quote: Data is a precious thing and will last longer than the systems themselves.
author: Tim Berners-Lee

quote: Programs are meant to be read by humans and only incidentally for computers to execute.
author: Donald Knuth

quote: Technology is best when it brings people together.
author: Matt Mullenweg

quote: Learning to write programs stretches your mind, and helps you think better.
author: Bill Gates

quote: The purpose of computing is insight, not numbers.
author: Richard Hamming

quote: Mathematics is the language in which God has written the universe.
author: Galileo Galilei

quote: The advance of science depends on the production of new techniques, new tools, and new materials.
author: Freeman Dyson

quote: Good code is its own best documentation.
author: Steve McConnell

quote: The real question is not whether machines think but whether men do.
author: B.F. Skinner

quote: If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.
author: Edsger Dijkstra

quote: Your best teacher is your last mistake.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Science is a beautiful gift to humanity; we should not distort it.
author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Innovation is the key to transforming dreams into reality.
author: Narendra Modi

quote: The brain is like a muscle. When it is in use we feel very good. Understanding is joyous.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: Technology is the campfire around which we tell our stories.
author: Laurie Anderson

quote: Don’t just be a consumer of knowledge, be a creator.
author: Ratan Tata

quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
author: John Muir

quote: Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Science and everyday life cannot and should not be separated.
author: Rosalind Franklin

quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled but a fire to be kindled.
author: Plutarch

quote: Vision without action is a daydream. Action without vision is a nightmare.
author: Japanese Proverb
